DataElement.preferredName: Children's Memory Scale Faces Delayed Scaled Score Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric representation of the scaled score for the Faces Delayed subtest in the Children's Memory Scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Children's Memory Scale Faces Delayed Scaled Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A test designed to make a comprehensive assessment of learning and memory in children and adolescents ranging in age from 5 to 16 years._A component of the Children's Memory Scale. A series of faces are presented one at a time. After a delay of about 30 minutes the child is asked whether or not each face was one of the faces on the initial list._Conversion of a raw score on a test to a common scale that allows for a numerical comparison.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A test designed to make a comprehensive assessment of learning and memory in children and adolescents ranging in age from 5 to 16 years.

Concepts.definition: A test designed to make a comprehensive assessment of learning and memory in children and adolescents ranging in age from 5 to 16 years.

Property.preferredDefinition: A component of the Children's Memory Scale. A series of faces are presented one at a time. After a delay of about 30 minutes the child is asked whether or not each face was one of the faces on the initial list.:Conversion of a raw score on a test to a common scale that allows for a numerical comparison.

Concepts.definition: A component of the Children's Memory Scale. A series of faces are presented one at a time. After a delay of about 30 minutes the child is asked whether or not each face was one of the faces on the initial list.
Conversion of a raw score on a test to a common scale that allows for a numerical comparison.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity that represents the conversion of a raw score on a test to a common scale in the Children's Memory Scale (CMS).
